name: grassroots
description: Political Campaign Software focused on voter outreach and volunteer management.

scripts.test: npm run test --prefix grassroots-frontend && npm run test --prefix grassroots-backend && npm run test:e2e --prefix grassroots-backend
scripts.check: npx tsc --noEmit --project grassroots-frontend && npx tsc --noEmit --project grassroots-backend && npx eslint .

echo '

' && npm install --prefix grassroots-backend && echo '
### Install Frontend ###
' && npm install --prefix grassroots-frontend
